forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the atmosphere is adorned with a crisp clarity, as the sun graces the skyline with its presence. A gentle breeze stirs the air, creating a refreshing dance with temperatures hovering around the low sixties. However, this afternoon, as the hours unfold, the warmth begins a subtle retreat, inviting the coolness of the west-southwest wind, which often whispers of the proximity of the fog. With gusts brushing past at up to 30 miles per hour, one can almost sense the life within the bay, teasing of the soft marine layer that may linger at the fringes.

As twilight approaches, the sky will don a mostly cloudy visage, the warm embrace of the sun yielding to the cool evening that envelopes the city. The expected low drifts toward the mid-fifties, reminding us that a light jacket or sweater will be not only wise but quite pleasant against the encroaching chill. As evening falls, this serene canvas offers a unique invitation: meander through the vibrant streets, perhaps stopping by a café where the rich aroma of brewing coffee meets the soft chatter of friends reuniting. Strolling along the Embarcadero, with the lights reflecting on the water, or exploring the art-lined paths of nearby neighborhoods could unveil the picturesque moments that make San Francisco truly captivating.
